scripts.deploy:development: ENV=development PREFIX=development CLOUDFRONT_ID=E38DNMOERQHY24 S3_BUCKET=patient.dev.conjure.health pnpm run ci-deploy-skeleton
scripts.deploy:production: ENV=development PREFIX=development CLOUDFRONT_ID=E38DNMOERQHY24 S3_BUCKET=patient.dev.conjure.health pnpm run ci-deploy-skeleton
scripts.deploy:testing: ENV=testing PREFIX=testing CLOUDFRONT_ID=E38DNMOERQHY24 S3_BUCKET=patient.dev.conjure.health pnpm run ci-deploy-skeleton
scripts.ci-deploy-skeleton: ENV=${ENV} VITE_APP_SHA=${GIT_HEAD:-$(git rev-parse --short HEAD)} VITE_APP_VERSION=$(node -pe 'require("./package.json").version') pnpm run build:${ENV} && aws s3 sync build/ s3://${S3_BUCKET} --region us-east-1 --delete && aws cloudfront create-invalidation --distribution-id ${CLOUDFRONT_ID} --paths '/*' --region us-east-1
